alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 8:08PM EDT until July 20 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CUYAHOGA AND NORTHERN SUMMIT COUNTIES... At 807 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Independence to 6 miles southwest of Macedonia to 8 miles west of Cuyahoga Falls, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Akron, Parma, Cuyahoga Falls, Kent, Solon, Hudson, Twinsburg, Tallmadge, Streetsboro, Warrensville Heights, Macedonia, South Russell, Highland Hills, Stow, Garfield Heights, Maple Heights, Broadview Heights, Aurora and Brecksville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
